name: Bacalhau Portuguese ao Forno (Salt Cod with Tomatoes and Olives)
author: Vólola
summary: Portuguese recipe for baked cod with potatoes, tomatoes and lots of olive oil. You need to soak the cod in water overnight to remove the salt. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 pound potatoes, cut into thick slices
2 tablespoons chopped parsley, or to taste
directions: Soak cod in a large bowl of water in the refrigerator for 24 hours, changing soaking water 4 times to remove excess salt
Drain water off cod; add lemon juice and salt
Let marinate in the refrigerator, about 1 hour
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange layers of cod, potatoes, onions, and tomatoes in a large baking dish
Drizzle olive oil over baking dish and season with salt
Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are tender and cod flakes easily with a fork, about 30 minutes
Add olives and parsley and continue baking until heated through, about 3 minutes more
